#summary Specs for OpenEVSE PLUS.

= Introduction =
The OpenEVSE Plus board contains a J1772 compliant controller board as well as a 4W switch mode power supply.

OpenEVSE Plus v1 Board connections

OpenEVSE Plus v2 Board connections

http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8212/8421959660_9e22cc662f_z.jpg

*OpenEVSE Plus Kit*

http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8498/8302318202_6206087755_z.jpg

The OpenEVSE Plus J1772 controller board kit comes with all the surface mount parts assembled, firmware loaded and includes the components to finish the controller board. The builder must solder the remaining through hole components.

=Building the Kit=

All through hole parts are places on the opposite side as the surface mount components. The board has markings to identify the parts and correct placement.
